name: Jellypy
description:
Jellypy automatically manages your Sonarr and Radarr monitoring based on what you watch in Jellyfin.

Native Sonarr Integration:
‚Ä¢ Automatically monitors next N episodes after watching
‚Ä¢ Smart episode buffer management with configurable minimum unwatched queue
‚Ä¢ Season-by-season monitoring control
‚Ä¢ Unmonitor watched episodes to reduce clutter
‚Ä¢ Automatic search triggering for newly monitored content

Native Radarr Integration:
‚Ä¢ Automatically unmonitor movies after watching
‚Ä¢ Percentage-based watch detection (configurable threshold)
‚Ä¢ Quality cutoff checking to prevent premature unmonitoring
‚Ä¢ Keep movies monitored if upgrades are still possible

Legacy Features:
‚Ä¢ Execute custom Python scripts on Jellyfin events (PlaybackStart, PlaybackStop, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Flexible conditional execution based on media properties
‚Ä¢ Custom environment variables and data attributes

Perfect for maintaining an organized, automated download workflow without manual intervention.
overview: Automatically manage Sonarr & Radarr monitoring based on your Jellyfin watch activity.

versions.changelog:
**Version 1.1.1 - Optimized Package Size**

üéØ **Key Improvements:**
‚Ä¢ Reduced download size from ~8MB to ~300KB
‚Ä¢ Removed unnecessary dependencies - only includes plugin-specific files
‚Ä¢ Server-based API key encryption using Jellyfin SystemId
‚Ä¢ Test connection functionality for Sonarr and Radarr
‚Ä¢ System-independent encryption that survives OS updates

üîí **Security Enhancements:**
‚Ä¢ AES-256-CBC encryption with PBKDF2 key derivation (10,000 iterations)
‚Ä¢ Three-component key generation: Plugin GUID + Server ID + Static Salt
‚Ä¢ Automatic encryption of API keys on save
‚Ä¢ Enhanced security documentation

üìù **Note:** Provides the same security features as v1.1.0 with optimized package size.

**Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release**

üöÄ **Core Features:**
‚Ä¢ Native Sonarr integration with automatic episode monitoring

‚Ä¢ Season-based monitoring control
